title: VSESVIT
lyrics:
When you try to figure out
Why do we fall?
When you try to realise
How deep is our hole?
Don't forget

We live while we fly

Don't ignore

We live while we fly



Let us fly

Let us fly



When our love is so reckless

Don't let roots entrap you

When our love is immense

Choose a [?]



Don't forget

We live while we fly

Don't ignore

We live while we fly



Let us fly

It's not our last flight

Let us fly

It's not our last flight

Let us fly

It's not our last flight



Let us fly

Let us fly

Let us fly
